text: Martin van der Borgh (28 October 1934 â€“ 12 February 2018) was a Dutch cyclist. Van der Borgh was born in Koningsbosch, Netherlands. Van der Borgh was active between 1954 and 1964.Martin van der Borgh . cyclingarchives.com He won the Ronde van Limburg (1954), Tour du Nord (1961) and individual stages of the Tour de France (1960) and Tour de Luxembourg (1958, 1963). He also won the bronze medal in the road race at the 1954 UCI Road World Championships. Van der Borgh died on 12 February 2018 in Brunssum, Netherlands of a stroke at the age of 83.Oud-Tourrenner Mart van der Borgh overleden ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Martin van der Borgh
